title: Ticket #1014: Warn users that analyze/better-analyze don't work on parallel universe
description: condor_q -analyze and -better-analyze don't work usefully for parallel universe jobs, since those jobs don't do "normal" matchmaking. This surprises users. condor_q should notice that the request is being done on a universe=parallel job and emit a warning in this case that the results may be nonsensical.
